text: oh inu anthu okhulupirira! Musaphwanye kupatulika kwa zizindikiro za Mulungukapenaza MweziWoyera kapenazanyamazimene zimabweretsedwa kukhala nsembe kapena zizindikiro zimene zimaikidwa pa izo kapena za anthu amene amadza ku Nyumba Yoyera kudzafuna chisomo ndi chisangalalo cha Ambuye wawo. Koma mukatsiriza miyambo ya Hajji, mukhoza kusaka ndipo musalole chidani cha anthu ena amene anakuletsani kulowa mu Mzikiti Woyera kuti chikuchimwitseni. Thandizanani wina ndi mnzake pa ntchito zabwino koma musathandizane mu ntchito ya uchimo ndi yoswa malamulo. Muopeni Mulungu. Ndithudi Mulungu amalanga kwambiri
